shortdesc.ph: Enables/Disables the audio route to the speakerphone.

note.props: cpp unreal bp unity flutter cs

section.note: This method is for Android and iOS only.

section.title: Applicable scenarios
section.p: If the default audio route of the SDK or the setting in cannot meet your requirements, you can call this method to switch the current audio route.

section.title: Call timing
section.p: Call this method after joining a channel.

ul.li: This method only sets the audio route in the current channel and does not influence the default audio route. If the user leaves the current channel and joins another channel, the default audio route is used.

If the user uses an external audio playback device such as a Bluetooth or wired headset, this method does not take effect, and the SDK plays audio through the external device. When the user uses multiple external devices, the SDK plays audio through the last connected device.

section.title: Related callbacks
section.p: After successfully calling this method, the SDK triggers the callback to report the current audio route.

pt.props: cpp unreal bp unity flutter rn electron cs

pd.p:
Sets whether to enable the speakerphone or earpiece:
: Enable device state monitoring. The audio route is the speakerphone.
: Disable device state monitoring. The audio route is the earpiece.

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See for details and resolution suggestions.

ul.props: native unreal bp unity rn electron cs
ul.li: < 0: Failure. See for details and resolution suggestions.
